title: Make CalendarView button and calendar borders slightly more prominent

requirements.summary: Make only the CalendarView 'Compare Progress' outline button border slightly thicker/more distinct without affecting other buttons.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Calendar page, the 'Compare Progress' button’s border is visibly more prominent than before (e.g., thicker than the default outline border).
Only the selected 'Compare Progress' button’s border styling is changed; other buttons across the app are unaffected.
The button remains an outline-style button and remains readable in both light and dark themes.

file_operations.description: Update ONLY the 'Compare Progress' <Button variant="outline"> instance in CalendarView (the button at the provided XPath) to use a more prominent border (e.g., Tailwind border-2 and explicit border-border), while keeping outline styling and ensuring readability in light/dark themes. Do not change any shared Button defaults or files under frontend/src/components/ui.

requirements.summary: Make only the main fullscreen calendar container in CalendarView have a slightly thicker/more distinct outer border without impacting other calendar instances.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Calendar page, the calendar’s outer border is visibly more prominent than before (e.g., thicker than the default 1px border).
Only the selected calendar element’s border styling is changed; other calendar instances (e.g., comparison date picker calendar) are unaffected.
The calendar border remains consistent with the app’s existing border color tokens and looks correct in both light and dark themes.

file_operations.description: Update ONLY the main CalendarComponent in CalendarView (the fullscreen calendar at the provided XPath) to use a more prominent outer border (e.g., Tailwind border-2 with border-border), keeping existing theme tokens and appearance in light/dark. Ensure other calendars (e.g., PhotoComparisonView date picker) are not affected and do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
